name: Advoidment
description:
This is Advoidment, a game created for our Casual Game Development class.  The class was about studying and developing games made for a casual audience, and this is what we created.

Advoidment is a game where you must click on the bagel as many times as you can in the time limit.  Beware - pesky ads will pop up from time to time, impeding your progress.  You must complete these ads to get back to clicking the bagel.

Andy Vece  (Minigame Programmer)
Jessia Niem (Art Design, UI Design, Version Control Lead)
Daniel Joseph Jr (Minigame Programmer, Art Design)
Christopher Murano (Management Programmer) 

Advoidment was created using Unity 2021.3.17f1 and  coded using Visual Studio 2022.
